name: A Sad Sad Christmas
description:
made for the awful jams holiday game jam. this is my 3rd jam. i am 14 years old and i use unity. you have 100 seconds to make as many people happy as possible!!

use the WASD or arrow keys to move and move your mouse around to swing your net. catch the little blue festive spirits and feed them to the sad people using the E key while on top of them. make as many people happy as possible. Good luck!!!
